0.1: God bless you, and remember you his covenant with Abraham and Isaac and Jacob.
0.0: ...The Jews in Jerusalem and in the land of Judah to their Jewish brethren in Egypt, peace and salvation!
0.3: God will open your hearts to reflect on His Torah and keep His commandments, and will give you a blessing and peace.
0.2: And give you a whole heart to fear him and to serve him with all your heart and all your soul.
